Model

Class SqlQuery

  • java.lang.Object
    • Model.SqlQuery

  • public class SqlQuery
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    tbagies This class is responsible for executing a query on the database It handles three types of queries (select statement , join statement on 2 tables, join statement on 4 tables)
